label: AgriculturalCertificate
comment: A legal proof of ownership, worthiness or qualification to operate an agricultural item.

datatypeProperties.comment: The actual effective date, time, date time or other date time value for this agricultural certificate.
A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.
A code specifying an applicable object, such as item, animal, person or organization, for this agricultural certificate.
A code specifying a type of specified certificate.
The code specifying the reason for the issue of this process certificate.
An identifier of a party issuing this sustainability assertion.
The requested effective date, time, date time or other date time value for this agricultural certificate.

referencedBy.comment: An agricultural certificate applied to this specified agricultural application.
An agricultural certificate specified for this crop plot.
